plot: During the end of WWII the Danish island of Bornholm was not liberated as the rest of the country on May 5, 1945. The following days on May 7 and 8 Soviet planes bombed the island.
title: Danmark 1940-45
plot_es: During the end of WWII the Danish island of Bornholm was not liberated as the rest of the country on May 5, 1945. The following days on May 7 and 8 Soviet planes bombed the island.
plot_en: During the end of WWII the Danish island of Bornholm was not liberated as the rest of the country on May 5, 1945. The following days on May 7 and 8 Soviet planes bombed the island.
